mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id, A.sale_ym, A.cat_id, A.menu_id, A.sale_quantity, B.menu_cost FROM SALES A INNER JOIN MENUS B ON A.menu_id = B.menu_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.sale_ym = #{saleYm} AND A.cat_id = #{catId} ORDER BY B.menu_cost DESC LIMIT #{size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (email, pw, phone, business_num, business_cd, business_name,service_yn, reg_dt) VALUE( #{email}, #{pw}, #{phone}, #{businessNum}, #{businessCd}, #{businessName}, #{serviceYn}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) CNT FROM USER WHERE email=#{email}
